mapper.select: select p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,p.brand_id as brandId,b.brand_cname as brandCname,pp.sell_price as sellPrice from product p inner join brand b on b.id=p.brand_id inner join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id where p.category_id in (${categoryIds}) order by p.on_shelf_time ${asc}

select p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,p.brand_id as brandId,b.brand_cname as brandCname,pp.sell_price as sellPrice from product p inner join brand b on b.id=p.brand_id inner join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id left join product_summary ps on ps.product_id=p.id where p.category_id in (${categoryIds}) order by ps.total_sold_qty ${asc}

select p.id as productId,p.product_name as productName,p.brand_id as brandId,b.brand_cname as brandCname,pp.sell_price as sellPrice from product p inner join brand b on b.id=p.brand_id inner join product_price pp on pp.product_id=p.id where p.category_id in (${categoryIds}) order by pp.sell_price ${asc}
